title: bugsplat
body:
For about week now every-time i have tried to start a match, my game crashes. I can do everything up to champion select but as soon as the match tries to load my game crash.

Can anyone help?

replies.body: If you are receiving bugsplats then a driver or hardware issue might be failing to render the game.  If this is the case for you, your best bet would be to use our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot this.  This should do the trick, but let me know if you have any questions!
